Drama / Romance
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0139818/


Filmed at Piraeus, Greece

This drama from Greek director Yiorgos Tzavellas stars Yiorgos Glinos as a sea captain named Yiakoumis who decides to give up the sailing life so he can be near his family. All seems well until Yiakoumis' past catches up with him. He had fathered a daughter with a prostitute many years before, and now she's grown up to be a prostitute as well. Her dying mother begs Yiakoumis to claim Agni as his own, but his guilt makes him hesitate.
